Entity Recognition and Masking: It determines which entities—persons, places, organizations, dates, addresses, etc.—are mentioned in a text
Important Sentence: Identifies relevant sentences having more impact.
Important Lemmas: Shows the phrases deemed particularly representative during the analysis.
Important Phrases: Shows the phrases deemed particularly representative during the analysis.
Relation Analysis: Relation extraction is a type of document analysis that labels concepts expressed in the text with their semantic role.
Sentiment Analysis: Sentiment analysis is a type of document analysis that determines how positive or negative the tone of the text is.
